metadata.name: Floppy Webseries Collection #2
metadata.description: Floppy is a community-driven collectibles project featuring 10,000 passionately designed and masterfully curated NFTs. Each Floppy is unique, and allows owners to participate in exclusive events such as NFT claims, raffles, giveaways, character and story development, game and series production, world building, and more! Join us and let's riot!
